Package org.fcrepo.server.security

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Authorization  
    BackendSecurity
    Interface for accessing backend service security info.
    BERoleConfig
    Configuration for a given backend service role.
    ContextRegistry

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRoleConfig
    Abstract implementation of BERoleConfig.
    AttributeFinderModule  
    BackendPolicies  
    BackendSecurityDeserializer
    SAX parser to deserialize the beSecurity XML file that contains configuration properties for backend services.
    BackendSecuritySpec
    Class that instantiates information parsed from the beSecurity.xml file.
    BESecurityConfig
    Security configuration for backend services.
    DefaultAuthorization
    The Authorization module, protecting access to Fedora's API-A and API-M endpoints.
    DefaultBackendSecurity
    A Module for accessing backend service security configuration information.
    DefaultRoleConfig  
    MethodRoleConfig  
    PDPConfigurationFactory  
    PolicyFinderModule
    XACML PolicyFinder for Fedora.
    PolicyLoader  
    PolicyParser
    A validating parser for XACML policies.
    PolicyParser.ThrowAllErrorHandler
    This class is a workaround to some shift in the behavior of anonymous inner classes
